message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I tried to make a withdrawal, but I got a message asking me to provide some documents. Can you explain why?
I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can assist you better. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is John Doe, my date of birth is June 12, 1985, and my email is john.doe@example.com.

Thanks, John. That's all correct! Your withdrawal is currently pending due to an anti money laundering check, which is part of our security procedures to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. We’ll need additional documents to proceed.
Okay, what documents do I need to provide?

To process your withdrawal, please provide a government-issued ID, a recent utility bill confirming your address, and proof of the source of funds, such as a bank statement or payslip. You can upload these via your account portal under the 'Verification' section.
Got it. I’ll upload the documents now. How long does the review process take?

Once your documents are uploaded, our verification team will review them within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email confirmation once the review is complete. Would you like me to guide you through the upload process?
No, I think I can manage. Thanks for the help!
You're very welcome, John! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
